Quickstrike:




Looking at the coordinates, Quickstrike slumped his shoulders. He 
didn't quite get this. "Tell me again, why we're gonna fight th' 
Allience, then defend 'em? Why can't we jus' kill 'em, then kill th' 
Maxis."  He frowned. "Ah ain't never heard of no Allience. Call me 
obsolete." He shrugged. He stepped out to the hallway.
